content.en: DNA Computing: Scientists are exploring how cells and nature can "compute" and solve computational problems. They are investigating the use of DNA computing, DNA self-assembly, temperature gradient-based DNA computing, and other algorithms to perform logical computation, solve graph problems, design DNA libraries, and more. These studies aim to harness the power of nature and DNA for applications in nanotechnology, molecular computers, and biomolecular computing.
content.da: DNA-beregning: Forskere undersøger, hvordan celler og naturen kan "beregne" og løse computermæssige problemstillinger. De undersøger brugen af DNA-beregning, DNA-selvmontering, temperaturgradient-baseret DNA-beregning og andre algoritmer til at udføre logiske beregninger, løse grafproblemer, designe DNA-biblioteker og mere. Disse studier sigter mod at udnytte naturens og DNA's kraft til anvendelser inden for nanoteknologi, molekylære computere og biomolekylær beregning.
